root: ^As you aproach the house of the lumberjack, you notice few people standing near the door.
^"Andrey open the door, We know you're there!"
^You can notice that the men are armed and they don't look too friendly.
^As you aproach them, they notice you.
^"Well, well who do we have here? Are you lost kiddo?"

s: ^"I'm looking for the lumberjack, and I think you know where he is."

Asked: ^"You look like you do have something in your pouch. And I think we're gonna take it. Get'em boys."
Trouble: ^"Well I think the trouble has found you. Get'em boys."
Fight: ^"If you're looking for a fight... I think we can deliver."
